title: Method 'CreatePlatformView' in type 'SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Handlers.SKCanvasViewHandler' from assembly 'SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Core, Version=2.88.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' does not have an implementation.
body:
**Description**

Method 'CreatePlatformView' in type 'SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Handlers.SKCanvasViewHandler' from assembly 'SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Core, Version=2.88.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null' does not have an implementation.

**Code**

Maui App that uses SkiaSharp and crashes during Startup

**Expected Behavior**

Application works

**Actual Behavior**

Application Crashes

**Basic Information**

It seems in Maui preview 14 (which is installed on my computer, don't know how this happend because Maui is still in Preview 13)
The base Class of 

https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/main/source/SkiaSharp.Views.Maui/SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Core/Handlers/SKCanvasView/SKCanvasViewHandler.Windows.cs
Was changed so that a CreatePlatformView method is necessary.
Because this is not implemented Maui Crashes on Startup.

**Screenshots**


**Reproduction Link**
